fulltext:
Trinh Thanh Dat 
Full stack Developer 
PERSIONAL INFORMATION 
- Full Name:  
Trinh Thanh Dat 
- Sex:  
Male 
- DOB:  
August 9, 1992 
- Address:  
111, 30/4 street, Binh An ward, Di An district, Binh Duong province. 
- Mobile:  
(+84) 398432012 
- Email:  
dat.trinh0908@gmail.com 
SUMMARY 
 
2 years of experience with Java and C# frameworks like Spring, Hibernate, ADO.NET… 
 
Working onsite Malaysia for 6 month 
 
Experienced with front-end framework like angular js, angular 2 -6 
 
Familiar with Java, C# 
 
Used to working with professional Scrum team. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
 
Databases: SQL Server, MySQL 
 
Tools Source Control: Git, SVN 
 
Programming Languages: Java, C#, JavaScript, TypeScript,  
 
Frameworks: Spring, Hibernate, Entity framework, .net MVC, Angularjs, Angular 2+ 
 
IDEs: Eclipse, Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code,  
 
Server: Tomcat, IIS, Maven 
 
Operating Systems: Windows, Linux 
 
Foreign language: English 
 
Soft skills: Teamwork, learning skill, hard working 
CAREER SUMMARY 
Apr 2017 – Apr 2019  
FPT Software Ho Chi Minh 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
Sep 2018 – Apr 2019 (Now) 
Fullstack Developer 
Project –UPSTREAM HSE ONLINE – PETRONAS 
Project Description: The system of modules to manage the health, safety, working environment of 
Petronas oil and gas employees, allowing user to manage the plan, dashboard, performance, 
incident, etc ...  Statistics unexpected events, give user the list of causes of problems and provide 
appropriate solutions to problems, and produce monthly and quarterly reports. 
Responsibilities: 
 
Write/Test API with .Net core and Entity framework to load and update data 
 
Maintenance project  
 
Working in Malaysia for 6 month 
 
Use Angular 6 to separate project into many children module 
 
Use .Net MVC core to write Enhancement for this project 
 
Use Devexpress to Design/Custom report for end user 
Requirement analysis: 
 
Implement, review and fix bug 
 
Training and guideline new member. 
 
Testing and supporting customer on technical issues. 
Technologies Used: C Sharp 7.0, .NET CORE, .NET MVC , SQL Server, Angular 6 
Jan 2018 – Sep 2018 
Junior Developer 
Project –BLUEJAPAN – CES 
Project Description: In Japan, Electric was be managed with every retailer, so they need a system 
management the retailer, management the product, contract, customer for each retailer. 
The BlueJapan use Angular Js with the supporting from KendoUI allow end user create/ update 
request to Register/MoveIn system to use electric or gas  
Responsibilities: 
 
Testing and supporting customer on technical issues. 
 
Read and understand user story requirement 
 
Use .Net 4.5 to write API to load and update request from customer 
 
Using Angular js and Kendo UI to implement page to management request from end user  
Requirement analysis: 
 
Implement, review, unit test and fix bug 
 
Training and guideline new member. 
 
Testing and supporting customer on technical issues. 
Technologies Used: C Sharp 7.0, Angular Js, ASP.NET 4.5, SQL Server 
Oct 2017 - Jan 2018 
Junior Developer 
Project: Organ Match Report (AOMS) 
Project description: The Red Cross Society in the world want to have organ donation system 
to manage the organ between the donor and the receipient and export PDF file report. 
AOMS main technologies includes C #, angular 2, SQL server, SSRS, etc. 
Responsibilities 
 
Understand project structure  
 
Use .NET Api and Entity framework to write Api to get data end return to report  
 
Perform integration test and fix bug. 
 
Implement features and maintain legacy system. 
 
Use SSRS to create / edit report for end user to management Donor and Receipient 
 
Design page to custom parameter and show report with Angular 2 
Technologies used 
 
C#/ ASP.NET 
 
Angular 2, HTML, CSS 
 
Entity framework 
 
Visual studio/SQL server 
 
AWS S3 
Jun 2017 – Oct 2017 
Fresher 
Project: Movie management system (OJT) 
Project description: The system allows user can update the movie information every day and 
save new movie into personal database from the cloud database or the manual input. 
Responsibilities 
 
Write API with Anypoint Studio get list movie everyday and update in local DB 
 
Undertand flow and Sub flow 
 
How to working with Mule project 
 
Knowledge about microservice 
Technologies used 
 
J2EE/Java, Anypoint Studio, MySQL. 
Apr 2017– Jun 2017 
Fresher 
Project: Fresher report 
Project description: The recruitment process of FPT Software take many steps and spent a lot 
of time of the interviewer and Interview admin. So, they need a system implement interview process 
to save the time.  
Responsibilities 
 
Study requirement 
 
Understand project structure 
 
Use Javascript in JSP to implement UI 
 
Write service with JPA and Hibernate to get data from DB   
Technologies used 
 
J2EE/Java, Web Services (Restful), MongoDB, Hibernate, Spring. 
EDUCATION 
 
The Degree Of Engineer Nong Lam University
